__e: He shall still be the means of discovering for me where they have hidden the sword and mask.
My daughter is unable to speak since the day I hid the sword and the brain.
It was to be an axe age, a sword age, a storm age, when brother would turn against brother, and men would fight each other until the world was finally destroyed.
You left the sword of vengeance this day,
The sentence is death. Death by the sword of the murdered.
I shall never fear my father's sword.
What you see here, is our precious family-sword ... This is the proof ...
If he's looking for answers from that assassin... my father's sword can get it quicker than brain reading.
Ltto Ogami, die under the blade of the Tsuchigumos.
Never, till Caesar's 3 and 30 wounds be well avenged. or till Octavius Caesar have added slaughter to the sword of traitors.
I need a sword to be king.
I saw you leading the army, charging with the troops, dressed in white, a sword in hand.
You wanted to buy the sword from that guy. What's his name?
As he's on his way I shall go to meet him... sword in hand!
The sword which can be created only by those who love Kamui deeply--
If you answer correctly, You'll get the sword,
Sometimes the way of the sword is the only road to peace.
You will not be able to overcome it without the Sword of the Sun.
The sword of the lord is filled with blood.
Wherever the flag rises over some lonely Army post... there may be one man, one captain... fated to wield the sword of destiny.
